attributes.title: no no no no no no no
attributes.review: hope ya had fun with the boys but i donâ€™t be sad because this app killed my tomatoes. donâ€™t ever get this app my best friend dropped a pie because of this app and it shouldnâ€™t even exist. orange is my least favorite color and this app has pictures of a strange orange man and iâ€™m very upset. never get this app. i do like orange juice though. did you know that trees smell really funny? they do. also my dog just farted. it stunk just like this app. whoever made this app clearly has lost a few too many brain cells and should probably be stranded on an island with a bunch of toilets. also, pineapple does NOT belong on pizza. whatever you think youâ€™re doing you need to stop. did you know tiktok is the BEST app there is? itâ€™s true. also i like fries. not this app though.

attributes.title: ğŸ¥´
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our commander in cheese but as soon as it finished downloading my elf on the shelf started Tangoing uncontrollably with my pet caterpillarğŸ’ƒğŸ». With a palpable romance blossoming between them my pet caterpillar became pregnantğŸ‘©‍â¤ï¸‍ğŸ’‹‍ğŸ‘©. Since such a love was forbidden, my caterpillar went to crooked Hillary Clinton for an abortion using her dirty emailsğŸ˜±. After my caterpillar had exercised her right to choose ğŸ‘she ate some Cheetos but to her surprise the Cheeto genie Donald came to grant her wishes ğŸ¤¬but when he saw she wasnâ€™t a straight white man and was in fact, a caterpillar who did meth that one timeğŸ¥µ, he receded into the depths of his scandals and disappearedğŸ˜³. Now I have an elf on the shelf who isnâ€™t emotionally stableğŸ˜­, a caterpillar with PTSD from a bag of Cheetos and a new favorite kind of mushrooms ğŸ„ ğŸ„ğŸ„thanks Trump ğŸ˜©

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: The SECOND I opened this app my phone became incredibly slow and kept glitching. Then I started getting messages from Donald trump himself telling me to look out my window! When I looked outside there were ten MAGA flags I SCREAMED and tried to delete the app but it wouldnâ€™t let me. Eventually I calmed down and forgot about it but I had gotten another text from trump he said that he was watching me and it was only a matter of time until I became a Cheeto like him. I got really scared and tried to call someone for help but anytime someone answered I heard a grown man chanting trump 2020! There was only one thing I could do to get rid of this app. I threw my phone into a bag of Cheetos and lit it on fire as a sacrifice to the Cheeto gods. Thank god trump canâ€™t stalk me anymore! DONT GET THIS APP!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Glitches, FBI and death threats
attributes.review: Prior to downloading this HORRIBLE app my IPhone was doing great! By great I mean it had no racism, vulgar language and false information getting infiltrated by an app. Then this PATHETIC app was downloaded and the phone started glitching. I started to pray over it because I did not want the demonic spirit of Donald J Trump to overtake my iphone and kill me. I said â€œNot today Satan also known as DJTâ€. Once I deleted the app, my phone went back to normal and the happy, non-racists, non-rapists and clean language left my phone. Iâ€™m glad the evil, Satan spirit of DJT left my perfectly Holy iPhone. BE CAREFUL AND DO NOT LET THE DEMONIC JEZEBEL SPIRIT OF TRUMP COME OVER YOUR PHONE! He can have a Jezebel spirit because it is not confimed he was born female and with a small loan of a million dollars transitioned to female. Prove me wrong, I dare you ğŸ¤­âœŒğŸ½ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹ğŸ’‹

attributes.title: âœ¨âœ¨ğŸ§šğŸ¼‍â™‚ï¸ğŸ§šğŸ¼‍â™‚ï¸Bunker boiiâœ¨âœ¨ğŸ§šğŸ»ğŸ§šğŸ»
attributes.review:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

  
Three days grade school,
three days high school.

  
Those were awkward.

  
Three days college. I'm glad I took 
a day and hitchhiked around the hive.

attributes.title: noâ¤ï¸
attributes.review: I just downloaded this app and when I first opened it a picture of the angry orange came up! Literally not what I got the app for and then when I tried to delete the app from my phone all the lights in my house turned off and the angry orange WAS SITTING ON MY COUCH! Then when I tried to ask him to leave he sprouted wings and turned into a troll! He started crapping piles of cheetos all over my house and guess who has to clean them up? ME THATS WHO. Honestly the makers of this stupid app should have to come to my house and take responsibility for their angry orange troll child. They should be the ones cleaning up the piles of cheetos around my house. I canâ€™t believe tech support hasnâ€™t come to my house to remove their orange troll, absolutely apalled at the terrible services of this app.

attributes.title: What is this bull?
attributes.review: This app is unbelievable, utterly disgusting. I came across the app and thought it would be a great idea to download it because well, Iâ€™m a trump supporter ;), I mean Namjoon would be a better president but anyway back to the app. I left the app open before turning my phone off and at 3:00am I got hundreds of notifications from this app saying â€˜send noodsâ€™ like oH mY gOd, what is happening? I went into the app and bam, trump wee wee. I, being 96 years of age, have seen my fair share of tHiNgS but this?! As a president? Have some decency. Anyway, stop the racism, stop being an idiot, stop hiding in a bunker and grow a pair. Trump has the audacity to talk big and bad yet heâ€™s hiding in a bunker, what kind of p*ssy president is that?(again, Joonie could do better) thank you for listening.

attributes.title: Yeahâ¤ï¸                                         NoğŸ‘ğŸ‘„ğŸ‘
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app so I would always be informed when the Oompa Loompa running our country was having an event but it was taking a little while to load so I decided it would be better to do some knitting while I waited. Suddenly out of the sky flew down the wonkavator with all the other Oompa Loompas tumbling out of it! They started to attack me for whatever reason and I had no other choice but to fight them off with my knitting needles!! They kept singing the little songs from the movie while attacking me and calling me a â€œbad eggâ€ which hurt my feelings but I got a leg up on them because I found their supply of fizzy lifting drinks and floated away to safety. App still hasnâ€™t loaded yet. Bad experienceğŸ‘ğŸ˜¡
